summary: This document is a summary of account balances and transactions for a Deutsche Bank account for the period of October 1, 2018, to October 31, 2018. It details the beginning and ending balances, deposits, withdrawals, service charges, and interest earned during the month. The document also includes instructions for addressing errors or inquiries related to the account.
